name: Lunar Stone - Origin of Blood
description: Lunar Stone is an exclusively designed first-person shooting story in VR. Unique dodging system strengthens combat against the dark force creatures. The magical stones will lead you on a magnificent adventure. With the help of your beloved companions you will find the answers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel I7 4790k Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX970/AMD RX470 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Difinition Audio Additional Notes: Only for HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel I7 6700K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX1060/AMD RX480 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Difinition Audio Additional Notes: Only for HTC Vive
